definition: an extravagant hope/to have excessive expectations
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards

sentences.english: The poor quarryman would have no tomb and no hope of an afterlife.
sentences.chinese: 這個可憐的採石工沒有墳墓，也不能奢望來世。

sentences.english: Blessed is he that expects nothing , for he shall never be disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 無奢望者有福，因其永遠不會失望。

sentences.english: I do not dare wild hope China to win at one fell swoop, but hopes is peace.
sentences.chinese: 我不敢奢望中國一舉奪魁，但更希望的是和平。

sentences.english: Distant love even hug is extravagant hopes.
sentences.chinese: 異地戀連擁抱都是奢望。

sentences.english: You cannot expect to be both grand and comfortable. —Sir J. M. Barris.
sentences.chinese: 你不能奢望同時是偉大的而又舒適的。

sentences.english: But now it can only become an extravagant hope.
sentences.chinese: 但這些現在看來都只能變成一種奢望。

sentences.english: He had no forwardly idea or desire for enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有上進的理想，也沒有貪圖享受的奢望。

sentences.english: She has no especial personal ambition.
sentences.chinese: 她沒什麼特別的個人奢望。

sentences.english: Don't attach any extravagant hope to it.
She also talked about her ambition to be a leading Korean actress in the future.
sentences.chinese: 她也談了關於她將帶領未來韓國女演員的奢望。

sentences.english: But I dare not hope it.
We cannot expect to live defectively and pray effectively.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能奢望日子過得沒見證，禱告卻能有功效。
當然，他的奢望最終落空。

sentences.english: And a, edge to edge, who did not expect each other is always thought?
sentences.chinese: 聚散一場，緣來緣往，誰不曾奢望是彼此永遠的念想？

sentences.english: I dare not to entertain wild hope China with one action the defloration , but what to even hope is a peace.
sentences.chinese: 我不敢奢望中國一舉奪魁，但更希望的是和平。

sentences.english: Blessed is he that expects nothing, for he shall never be disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 中文無奢望者有福，因其永不失望。

definition: to make extravagant demands/an unreasonable request
to hope for sth/to count on/hope
hope and expectation/to anticipate/to look forward to/to await expectantly
to long for/to crave for/to greatly desire
unattainable/far-fetched/out of reach/exceedingly remote or distant
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
